name: GloMan (Limbo dance remake)
description:
Me and 50 (a bit less since some dropped out) game devs decided to remake all the minigames in the first Mario Party. I decided to remake "Limbo Dance" and this is what I made.

Music by Abstraction (with no affiliation to PossiblyAxolotl) https://abstractionmusic.com/
